enWisdom: In deliberateness there is [precaution and] assurance
One who acts unhurriedly is deserving of success
The one who acts with deliberateness is successful even if he perishes

Wisdom: أَصَابَ مُتَأَنٍّ أَوْ كَادَ أَخْطَأَ [أحطأ] مُسْتَعْجِلٌ أَوْ كَادَ
enWisdom: The one who acts without haste is either successful or close to success
Deliberateness in action protects against errancy

Wisdom: رَوِيَّةُ الْمُتَأَنِّي أَفْضَلُ مِنْ بَدِيهَةِ الْعَجِلِ
enWisdom: The deliberation of the slow is better than the impulsiveness of the hasty

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْأَنَاةِ فَإِنَّ الْمُتَأَنِّيَ حَرِيٌّ بِالْإِصَابَةِ
enWisdom: You must adopt deliberateness, for indeed one who acts unhurriedly is deserving of success
One who acts without haste is saved from mistakes

Wisdom: لَا تَكُنْ فِيمَا تُورِدُ كَحَاطِبِ لَيْلٍ وَغُثَاءِ سَيْلٍ
enWisdom: Do not be, in that which you mention, like the one who collects firewood at night or like the froth over the flood

Wisdom: لَا إِصَابَةَ لِمَنْ لَا أَنَاةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: There is no success for one who has no deliberateness
